channel.title: Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?"

item.title: Re: Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?
Re: Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?
item.content:encoded: Do you get to redo the missions and get the ones you lose back?

item.title: Re: Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?
item.content:encoded:
You keep:
- Soul Glove
- Sword of the Reaper
- Swallowtail Butterfly
- Heck Butterfly
- Silver Hairpin
- Glowing Mood Ring

The last two are not Items from the Other side, but they require petals to make.

You lose:
- Substitute Soul Reaper Badge
- Soul Candy
- Captain's Jacket
- Reaper Blood: All three

item.title: Re: Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?
item.content:encoded: you loose Soul Candy, and Captains Jacket, I'm not sure about others

item.title: Re: Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?
item.content:encoded: My understanding is that you keep all of them.

item.title: Do you keep ALL reaper items during loop?
item.content:encoded: I'm not at the loop as of yet, nowhere close really. But it says you keep them all in the guide. Does this include items needed to get into the soul reaper missions, but that you do not actually get from soul reaper missions? Mostly curious since it took me days to get the bloody Soul Glove :P I don't want to give it up now, lol. I saw the Heck Butterfly was an item you get to keep so I'm hopeful :)
